DEMO_122_MSG_010: ́We're back, yer Highness! Just as we suspected... the source o' all the turbulence was indeed comin' from the top floor.
DEMO_122_MSG_020: ́There's a machine up there that can make this whole island float... we went an' fixed it, and the shakin' stopped right away.
DEMO_122_MSG_080:
̅Hmm... a gravity controller, you say! Who knew that the humans possessed such incredible technology.
ā
DEMO_122_MSG_100:
́R-r-right! That is, after all, our primary concern!
Surely the villagers couldn't handle yet another earthquake!
DEMO_122_MSG_090: ̅And yet, there was a malfunction in such a complicated device... and you're sure that you've fixed it, correct?
DEMO_122_MSG_110: ́Yep... the machine's back in workin' order, so I don't think the shakin' should be an issue from here on out.
DEMO_122_MSG_120:
̅Jack... we've no reason to question Ace's integrity. He is, without a doubt, our best engineer... You must take his word for it.
ā
DEMO_122_MSG_130: ̅I suppose we should prepare a celebration, to honor our brave heroes that have helped us out once more.
DEMO_122_MSG_140: ́But there's more, yer Majesty! Now that we've gone an' fixed the problem, like you asked... !
DEMO_122_MSG_150: ̅Yes, of course. I haven't forgotten my promise. I expect you'll put that Fusion Machine to good use!
DEMO_122_MSG_160:
́Roger that, and thanks a bunch, yer Majesty!
You hear that, ȁ! Let's go give 'er a whirl!
